entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (npe_han_solo_falcon.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_12: Well it's not hard.  Put the crosshairs on the bad guys and shoot!  I'll give you more tips if you need 'em!  Follow me!
entries.s_4: Kid, I'm gonna need you up in the turret.  You know how to work one of those things, don't you?
entries.s_6: Yes, you can count on me!
entries.s_8: Great, now get up there, we don't have much time.  Follow me!
